DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy , predictability , stability safety corneal wavefront-guided photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) correct hyperopia astigmatism radial keratotomy ( RK ) .
DOC.brief_title: Photorefractive Keratectomy ( PRK ) Hyperopia After Radial Keratotomy
DOC.criteria: Hyperopia hyperopic astigmatism spherical equivalent + 9,25 D astigmatism 4,5 D ; Uncorrected Visual Acuity 20/40 worse ; BestCorrected Visual Acuity 20/60 better . Systemic ocular condition could bias result Previous photorefractive surgery
